0.1.name: wordpress/bablic
0.1.description:
Save time & money, and give the best localization solution to your site. This plugin will integrate your site with your Bablic account. If you don't have an account, you can create a free one at http://www.bablic.com

Bablic can transform any website, regardless of the server-side implementation, to a localized site. Bablic will automatically detect 'un-localized' text and send it to translation. Bablic will send content to professional translators, or provide you with the option to translate yourself, directly on top of your site, the best user-interface your translators can ask for.

Bablic support bi-directional languages, CSS modifications in specific locales, image replacement, and much more.

To read more, on register for a free Beta account: http://www.bablic.com

  • This plugin sends and receives content from your site to our server.
    • <
